mapper.select: select id, source_name, source_type, hdfs_path, hive_table, table_column, user_id, group_id, create_date, modify_date from data_source where user_id = #{userId} and source_type=#{type} order by create_date desc
select id, source_name, source_type, hdfs_path, hive_table, table_column, user_id, group_id, create_date, modify_date from data_source where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into data_source(source_name, source_type, hdfs_path, hive_table, table_column, user_id, group_id, create_date, modify_date) values(#{sourceName}, #{sourceType}, #{hdfsPath}, #{hiveTable}, #{tableColumn}, #{userId}, #{groupId}, #{createDate}, #{modifyData})
